mapper.sql: leagueid, serverid, leaguename, maxleaguer, level, creator, createdate, createtime, remark
mapper.insert: insert into server_league_info (leagueid, serverid, leaguename, maxleaguer, level, creator, createdate, createtime, remark) values (#{leagueid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaguename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxleaguer, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert all
into server_league_info (leagueid, serverid, leaguename, maxleaguer, level, creator, createdate, createtime, remark) values (#{item.leagueid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.serverid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.leaguename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.maxleaguer, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.creator, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from server_league_info where 1=1 and leagueid = #{0}
mapper.update: update server_league_info set serverid = #{serverid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leaguename = #{leaguename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maxleaguer = #{maxleaguer, jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, createdate = #{createdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 and leagueid = #{leagueid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update server_league_info
serverid = #{serverid, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leaguename = #{leaguename, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maxleaguer = #{maxleaguer, jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
createdate = #{createdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1 and leagueid = #{leagueid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
